templates_pairs:
daily_notes_path="Daily Notes"

prev_format="< Previous"

echo "[[$(ls $(pwd)/$daily_notes_path | tail -n2 | head -n1 | cut -f 1 -d '.')|$prev_format]]"

daily_notes_path="Daily Notes"
next_format="Next >"

sed -i "s/$next_format/[[$(/usr/bin/ls $(pwd)/$daily_notes_path | tail -n1 | cut -f 1 -d '.')|$next_format]]/g" $(pwd)/$daily_notes_path/$(/usr/bin/ls $(pwd)/$daily_notes_path | tail -n2 | head -n1)

echo "$next_format"
